definition: feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats, to eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
details:
noun
- feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats
= example: feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats
= synonyms: true cat
- any of several large cats typically able to roar and living in the wild
= synonyms: big cat
- a large tracked vehicle that is propelled by two endless metal belts
- a whip with nine knotted cords
= example: a whip with nine knotted cords
= synonyms: cat-o'-nine-tails
- the leaves of the shrub Catha edulis which are chewed like tobacco or used to make tea
- a spiteful woman gossip
= example: a spiteful woman gossip
- an informal term for a youth or man
= synonyms: guy, hombre, bozo
verb
- to eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
= synonyms: cast
- to beat with a cat-o'-nine-tails
